post.body: I rate songs to make smart playlists - 5 means awesome English songs, 4 means awesome non-English songs :) 2 means delete.
I don't have creases either, but I got used to putting eyeliner on the top during high school - it's not too hard but it's fun :)
Haha apologies. But I'm learning how to have sexy eyes! :) See you next week :D
No wonder, lol. I'm bored so I'm playing with makeup :) Tell her I think her eyes look awesome, especially with her contacts.
Hahaha you know so much about her eye make-up :P Revlon eye things?
I was facebook stalking Eunice and I really like her eye make-up. Does she wear fake lashes or just awesome mascara?
Just kidding I found a pretty fast torrent. Thanks though :)
Oh I see. Where did that come from...?
Honger?
I agree, irresponsible people suck.
Dude HELLA skill. :)That was fun, we should go together someday OKAY?
Tell me your finalized plans so I can figure things out :)
I feel like watching Forgetting Sarah Marshall. Does anybody know any websites to stream from?
The guy sitting next to me is using a film camera. That's re awesome.
Omg shooting ranges are fun! Here's a skill I'd be willing to spend time honing in the future.
I hit the first card I aimed for! It was a 10 of spades. Luck or skill? :)
My sister is lipid intolerant. Figures. (Just kidding.)
Fun fact about me: I don't know how to check the weather online. My dashboard Weather Widget is just about as informed as I get. In Celcius.
Norwegian Recycling is fun music to work to.
I'm using DestroyTwitter - http://tinyurl.com/84cr4p ...it's really pretty :) And it auto-updates!
